# File lib/json/common.rb, line 139
139:   def pretty_generate(obj)
140:     state = JSON.state.new(
141:       :indent     => '  ',
142:       :space      => ' ',
143:       :object_nl  => "\n",
144:       :array_nl   => "\n",
145:       :check_circular => true
146:     )
147:     obj.to_json(state)
148:   end
